label: backend-framework
description: Choose the backend framework that powers your application's server-side logic.

features.label: express
features.description: Express is a fast and minimalist web application framework for Node.js, providing robust routing and middleware capabilities.

label: database
description: Select the database technology to store and manage your application's data.

features.label: mongodb
features.description: MongoDB is a scalable NoSQL database, offering high-performance document storage and flexible data modeling.

features.label: mongoose
features.description: Mongoose is an Object Data Modeling (ODM) library for MongoDB, simplifying data validation and providing additional features.

features.label: mysql
features.description: MySQL is a popular relational database management system, ideal for structured data storage and retrieval.

label: rate-limiting
description: Enable rate limiting to control the rate of incoming requests to your backend API.

features.label: express-rate-limit
features.description: Express-rate-limit is a middleware for Express to implement rate limiting, protecting your server from abuse and potential attacks.
